text: Tomara tomadera samarthya anuyayi yerupa ghare tomara basa kara taderake'o serupa ghare basa karate debe; taderake uttyakta karabe na sankate phelara jan'ya; ara tara garbhabati haye thakale santana prasaba paryanta tadera jan'ya byaya karabe. Atahpara yadi tara tomadera santanaderake stan'ya dana karena tabe taderake parisramika debe ebam (santanera kalyana samparke) tomara sangatabhabe nijedera madhye paramarsa kara. Ara tomara yadi nija nija dabite anamaniya ha'o tahale an'ya nari pitara pakse stan'ya dana karabe
